entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Lars' Homestead was recently abandoned and a squatter named Zef was trying to make a go of the place. You helped him out with some problems and he gave you the inventory of what he bought from the Jawas and the next stop for the Sand Crawler. If you hurry you can intercept the Sand Crawler before it stops.
entries.journal_entry_description: Both the Rebel Alliance and the Empire are desperately looking for something that was in a recently arrived cargo. One part of the shipment was acquired by a Jawa trade party. They have been selling it off piecemeal across Tatooine from their Sand Crawler. After a run-in with some Desert Demons, you were able to retrieve an inventory of what the Jawas sold at Tosche Station and discovered their next destination: a place called Lars' Homestead.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Looks as if a squatter has moved in and taken over this moisture farm from someone else. Talk with him and find out what he purchased from the Jawas and where their next stop is.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Disarm the explosives on the harvesters before they can send the detonation signal to the harvester. The detonation timer is set to 4 minutes.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Despite your best efforts the droids set off the charge and destroyed the harvester.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You were unable to disarm the bomb before it went off and it destroyed the harvester. Go back to Zef and apologize for your failure.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Zef is upset with the destruction of his last moisture harvester, but he thinks he can make a go of the farm if it is cleared of the plague of greater desert womprats. You promised to do that for him.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You have wiped out the plague of great desert womprats for Zef. Now you need to go back and talk with him and see if you can get a list of what he purchased from the Jawas and find out what their next stop was going to be.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Zef has given you his datapad with what he purchased from the Jawas. Open your backpack and download the inventory from it.
entries.task08_message_box_text: You retrieved the data on what Zef purchased from the Sand Crawler. Looks like you can intercept the Sand Crawler before it gets to its next stop.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Congratulations, you have completed Lar's Homestead Quest.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: You managed to disarm the bomb. Now maybe Zef will tell you what he bought from the Jawas and where they headed off to.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Zef has given you his datapad with what he purchased from the Jawas. Open your backpack and download the inventory from it.
entries.task13_message_box_text: You retrieved the data on what Zef purchased from the Sand Crawler. Looks like you can intercept the Sand Crawler before it gets to its next stop.
